Name: Ashutosh Sharma

AboutMe.Name: Ashutosh Sharma
AboutMe.description: Welcome my name is Ashutosh. I am a software developer from Gurgaon, India. I Love to build great software products which helps in easing human work and help businesses succeed with their goals. I appreciates new technologies and good design(both implementation and UI). I love to learn new technologies and enhance my skill set. I have worked with few of the top businesses like ZOHO Corporation Pvt Ltd. and VizExperts India Pvt. Ltd. former is well known for its cloud solutions for businesses and its beautiful idea of first business operating system, and later is known for its defence related softwares.

ProfessionalSummary: Experience in development of Web & Enterprise applications using MEAN stack with ES2015 syntax, J2EE technologies and Object Oriented JavaScript.
Strong Knowledge of Node.js, Express.js, jQuery and MongoDB, React, Koa, Angular, Java, hibernate, Spring and Struts.
Cohesive team worker, having strong analytical, problem solving and interpersonal skills.
Strong in Data Structures and Algorithms.

vizexperts.Name: Vizexperts Pvt. Ltd.
ResponsibilitiesAndAchievements: Developed REST service to maintain workspaces to store and serve raster and vector layers from GeoServer.
Captured flight data and used it to place flight icon on map in 4 different states(default, bound to snapExtents, bound to videoExtents and center map to flight icon).
Import-Export facility which exports data from one Geo Server and imports into another.

zoho.Name: Zoho Corporation Pvt. Ltd.
ResponsibilitiesAndAchievements: Developed a module which gathers and processes large number of logs from Exchange Servers using ADSI. Using these logs different report gets created to help windows server administrators.
Developed a framework for exporting sub-reports using jasperreports library.
Developed a common framework for four different products to bookmark reports based on login name.
Responsible for the development and enhancements of the codes and existing process wherein I have contributed with many back end enhancements and UI modifications.

VizExperts.Title: IGVDS
Description: This is a defence project which uses live video and other flight data sent by a drone on border.
I used flight data to show flight icon on map in moving state
Wrote Services to provide image processing on live video footage
Used client side map api(openlayers) for multiple small and big features

VizExperts.Title: Georbis Server
Description: This project provides all map services(WMS, WFS, WPS, WCS) to a client.

My responsibility in this project was to create workspace for users. Workspace stores layers loaded on a map so that next time when user will open the workspace he can start his work from where he left.

Zoho.Title: Exchange Reporter Plus
Description: This project helps windows administrator by providing them reports from their active directory environment
I wrote bookmark framework with complete drag and drop functionality and integrated it with four different products related to active directory
Created new tab monitoring which contains 14 reports, dashboard with multiple graphs
Wrote framework to export sub-reports using jasper-reports
Many minor UI and back-end modification

NIT Calicut.Title: Fractal Image Compression using Locality Sensitive Hashing
Description: In this project, I have tried to reduce the complexity in comparing a range block with large number of domain blocks using locality sensitive hashing. Locality sensitive hashing clusters similar domain blocks in same bucket due to which we have to search a domain block in just one bucket whose hash value is close to range block for which we are searching domain block.

NIT Calicut.Title: Implementation Of Blind Signature using RSA and Elgamal
Description: It was an idea to implement a different signing technique called blind signature to level up the security in applications like E-Voting, E-Cash and others to hide information from the signer.

NIT Calicut.Title: Leave Management System
Description: This project was created to apply and manage leaves by students and teachers. Applied leave by student gets forwarded to PR if he approves, it gets forwarded to HOD. At the end of month a report was generated containing all the leaves record to calculate stipend for students and salary for teachers

GNIT.Title: Fractal Image Compression
Description: Wrote an algorithm according to the paper Fractal Image Compression, Yuval Fisher, 1994.

Journals & Publications.Title: Fractal Image Compression using Locality Sensitive Hashing
Journals & Publications.publisher: International Journal of Engineering Research and Training.

Workshop: Attended Industrial Training by SAP Labs on Big Data & Mobile Computing in Nov-2013.
